Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class Task

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Task extends Object implements Cloneable
Class that holds the information for a task with the ability to grab and set the info as well
Author:
Drew Bodnar

      public Task(String taskName, String taskDescription, boolean recurring, boolean active)
      Constructor for the Task class
      Parameters:
      taskName - name assigned to the current task
      taskDescription - description assigned to the current task
      recurring - tells whether or not the current task is recurring
      active - tells whether or not the current task is active
